mapper.select: SELECT m.ID AS "id", m.VERSION AS "version", m.PARENT_ID AS "parentId", m. NAME AS "name", m.IS_LEAF AS "isLeaf", m. LEVEL AS "level", m.URL AS "url", m.TARGET_NAME AS "targetName", m.NUMBER AS "number" FROM PMS_MENU m JOIN PMS_ROLE_MENU rm ON m.ID = rm.MENU_ID WHERE rm.ROLE_ID IN #{item} UNION SELECT m.ID AS "id", m.VERSION AS "version", m.PARENT_ID AS "parentId", m. NAME AS "name", m.IS_LEAF AS "isLeaf", m. LEVEL AS "level", m.URL AS "url", m.TARGET_NAME AS "targetName", m.NUMBER AS "number" FROM PMS_MENU m, PMS_ROLE r WHERE r.ID IN #{item} AND r.ROLE_TYPE = 1

and D.MENU_ID = #{menuId}
